  Blue-green deployment strategy

  AWS general best practices
  From the course: <strong><a href="/learning/aws-certified-solutions-architect-associate-saa-c02-9-services-and-design-scenarios" class="li-i18n-linkto" data-control-name="card_parent_content">AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate (SAA-C02): 9 Services and Design Scenarios</a></strong>
